content: 2sc into each st around 16sts round 3 single_crochet into the back loop of each st around 16sts round 4 single_crochet into each st around 16sts round 5 single_crochet into each of the first 4sts decrease x4 single_crochet into each of the remaining 4sts 12sts round 6 single_crochet into each of the first 4sts decrease x2 single_crochet into each of the remaining 4sts 10sts rnds 7 14 single_crochet into each st around 10sts stuff the feet firmly and the legs a little lighter for now tip you can use the opposite end of your crochet hook to tuck the stuffing in fasten_off first leg but not on second now we will join the legs if you need help with this next part please see this video on how to join the legs for the standard size weebee doll on the weebee and friends youtube channel although this doll is worked slightly differently the principles of how to join the legs is roughly the same so at this point i was at left hand side at the front of the leg you may be in a different location given the yarn weight and hook you have chosen as well as your personal gauge but don t worry round 15 we will start by working a single_crochet in each st until we reach the very centre stitch on the left-hand side at the back of the leg this was a single_crochet in each of the first 4sts for me but it may be more or less for you then take the other leg and place it to the left of the leg on your hook both feet pointing forward single_crochet into the central stitch on the right-hand side at the back of the other leg mine was the first st in the last round but work into whatever feels most comfortable this will join the legs together single_crochet in each of the remaining 9sts around the doll s left leg then single_crochet in each remaining st around the doll s right leg for me this was 6sts but for you it may be more or less depending on how many sts you worked originally to reach the side of the first leg so at the end of this round you should have 20sts 10 around each leg there may be a small gap between the legs when you have finished your doll you can simply take a length of yarn the same colour as the doll s underwear and sew this up move stitch marker to centre and single_crochet into each st to reach it round 16 single_crochet into each of the first 3sts work 2sc into the next st single_crochet into each of the next 2sts work 2sc into the next st single_crochet into each of the next 6sts work 2sc into the next st single_crochet into each of the next 2sts work 2sc into the next st single_crochet into each of the remaining 3sts 24sts round 17 single_crochet into each
